Title: Establishes a fine reimbursement credit for taxpayers fined for operating a bar or restaurant during the COVID-19 pandemic
Summary: Establishes a fine reimbursement credit for taxpayers fined for operating a bar or restaurant during the COVID-19 pandemic in the amount of such fine.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to establishing a fine reimbursement credit for taxpayers fined for operating a bar or restaurant during the COVID-19 pandemic
